name: WordParty
0:
”Alexa start word party”
”Alexa open word party”
”Alexa begin word party”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word party
des:
Word Party is an awesome way to learn more about words! With multiple difficulty levels from easy, medium, and hard, this game is fun for all ages. 
Word Party has tons of words for every level, so you'll never be bored!

Word Party keeps track of your total score and your highest streak. For example, if you play Word Party three times, and you get the scores 2, 4, and 5, your total score will be 11. 
Your highest streak is the most you have gotten correct in a row.

If you have a device that has a screen, on the screen where Alexa asks you your difficulty level of choice, buttons will appear for each choice. 
That way, instead of talking to Alexa, you can have fun by pressing the buttons on Alexa's screen.

Easy includes three-to-four letter words such as "pig", "stem", and "dog".
Medium includes five-to-seven letter words such as "rolled", "finger", and "catch".
Hard includes more complex words such as "aberration", "embezzlement", and "idiosyncratic".

If you enjoyed this skill, please give us a review. If you have any feedback for us, please leave a review explaining your feedback. Thank you!

Tell us what you think at awesomeaariv.com
Sound credit: orangefreesounds.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
